titleInfo.title: Labor Day Bluegrass Festival River Ranch Resort

mods.abstract: Color window card (Red and black on grey) poster announcing the Labor Day Bluegrass Festival Sept. 2-3-4 at the River Rach Resort 27 Miles east of Lake Wales, Fla starring Carl Story and the Rambling Mountaineers, Sunny Bluegrass Lincoln Co. Partners, Keil Brown and Tall Timber Bluegrass, American Bluegrass Express, Boggy Creek Bluegrass, Suns[h]ine Bluegrass boys, The River Ranch Ramblers. Features a metal photoplate of Carl Story and the Rambling Mountaineers. Poster was ordered by Leonard Needham (purchase order 18958).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
